title: Gallery Talk: Egoyomi—Picture Calendars for the New Year
title_display: Gallery Talk: Egoyomi—Picture Calendars for the New Year
hero_caption: Suzuki Harunobu. A Young Woman in a Summer Shower,1765. Clarence Buckingham Collection.
short_description: Explore the lavish Japanese woodblock printed calendars featured in Egoyomi: Picture Calendars for the New Year with educator Lucas Livingston.
description:
Explore the lavish Japanese woodblock printed calendars featured in Egoyomi: Picture Calendars for the New Year with educator Lucas Livingston.

Please note that the image on this page is for reference purposes only and may not be featured during the gallery talk.
